\define renderContent()
{{{ $(exportFilter)$ ||$:/core/templates/html-tiddler}}}
\end
<<renderContent>>






\define renderContent()
<$list filter={{$:/state/ExportOrderedText!!filter}} template='$:/core/templates/html-tiddler'/>
\end
<<renderContent>>






\define renderContent()
<$list filter={{$:/state/ExportOrderedText!!filter}} template='$:/core/templates/wikified-tiddler'/>
\end
<<renderContent>>






\define renderContent()
{{{ $(exportFilter)$ ||$:/core/templates/wikified-tiddler}}}
\end
<<renderContent>>






\define renderContent()
{{{ $(exportFilter)$ ||$:/core/templates/plain-text-tiddler}}}
\end
<<renderContent>>






\define renderContent()
{{{ $(exportFilter)$ ||$:/core/templates/wikified-tiddler}}}
\end
<<renderContent>>






\define search(state:"$:/temp/search")
<div class="tc-sidebar-lists">

<$set name="searchTiddler" value="$state$">
<div class="tc-search">
<$edit-text tiddler="$state$" type="search" tag="input" focus={{$:/config/Search/AutoFocus}} focusPopup=<<qualify "$:/state/popup/search-dropdown">> class="tc-popup-handle"/>
<$reveal state="$state$" type="nomatch" text="">
<$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/AdvancedSearch/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/AdvancedSearch/Caption}} class="tc-btn-invisible">
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch" text={{$state$}}/>
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$state$" text=""/>
<$action-navigate $to="$:/AdvancedSearch"/>
{{$:/core/images/advanced-search-button}}
</$button>
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible">
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$state$" text="" />
{{$:/core/images/close-button}}
</$button>
<$button popup=<<qualify "$:/state/popup/search-dropdown">> class="tc-btn-invisible">
{{$:/core/images/down-arrow}}
<$list filter="[{$state$}minlength{$:/config/Search/MinLength}limit[1]]" variable="listItem">
<$set name="resultCount" value="""<$count filter="[!is[system]search{$(searchTiddler)$}]"/>""">
{{$:/language/Search/Matches}}
</$set>
</$list>
</$button>
</$reveal>
<$reveal state="$state$" type="match" text="">
<$button to="$:/AdvancedSearch" tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/AdvancedSearch/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/AdvancedSearch/Caption}} class="tc-btn-invisible">
{{$:/core/images/advanced-search-button}}
</$button>
</$reveal>
</div>

<$reveal tag="div" class="tc-block-dropdown-wrapper" state="$state$" type="nomatch" text="">

<$reveal tag="div" class="tc-block-dropdown tc-search-drop-down tc-popup-handle" state=<<qualify "$:/state/popup/search-dropdown">> type="nomatch" text="" default="">

<$list filter="[{$state$}minlength{$:/config/Search/MinLength}limit[1]]" emptyMessage="""<div class="tc-search-results">{{$:/language/Search/Search/TooShort}}</div>""" variable="listItem">

{{$:/core/ui/SearchResults}}

</$list>

</$reveal>

</$reveal>

</$set>

</div>
\end

!Description

This macro lets you add a search bar that is the same as the search in the sidebar anywhere in your wiki by putting `<<search>>`. By default it uses the same state tiddler so any search you do will be shared with all the bars. If you want to use a different state tiddler you can give it as the macro parameter (see example below).

!!Usage

Basic: `<<search>>`

With custom state tiddler: `<<search state:"$:/temp/otherSearch">>`

!!Parameters

|!Parameter |!Description |
|!state |The state tiddler to use to store the state. Default: `$:/temp/search` |

!! Example

The code `<<search """$:/temp/otherSearch""">>` gives this output:

<<search """$:/temp/otherSearch""">>






\define inmysocksMobileMenusMakeState(MenuName)
$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/$(CurrentTiddler)$
\end

\define inmysocksMobileMenusMakeParentState(MenuName)
$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/$(ParentTiddler)$
\end

\define inmysocksMobileMenusEmptyMessage(MenuName MenuType)
<$reveal type='match' state="$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!normal_menu" text="""$MenuType$""">
	<$tiddler tiddler={{$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current}}>
		<$button class='tc-btn-invisible'>
				{{$:/core/images/chevron-left}}
				''<$view field=caption>
					<$view field=title/>
				</$view>''
				<$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current' $value=''/>
		</$button>
	</$tiddler>
	<br>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type='match' state="$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!table_of_contents" text="""$MenuType$""">
	<$button class='tc-btn-invisible'>
		{{$:/core/images/chevron-left}}
		<$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current' $value=''/>
	</$button>
	<$link to={{$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current}}>
		''<$view tiddler={{$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current}} field=caption><$view tiddler='$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current' field=text/></$view>''
	</$link>
	<br>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type='match' state="$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!table_of_contents_selective" text="""$MenuType$""">
	<$button class='tc-btn-invisible'>
		{{$:/core/images/chevron-left}}
		<$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current' $value=''/>
	</$button>
	<$link to={{$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current}}>
		''<$view tiddler={{$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current}} field=caption><$view tiddler='$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current' field=text/></$view>''
	</$link>
	<br>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type='match' state="$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!table_of_contents_selective_hierarchical" text="""$MenuType$""">
	<$button class='tc-btn-invisible'>
		{{$:/core/images/chevron-left}}
		<$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current' $value=''/>
	</$button>
	<$link to={{$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current}}>
		''<$view tiddler={{$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current}} field=caption><$view tiddler='$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current' field=text/></$view>''
	</$link>
	<br>
</$reveal>
\end

\define inmysocksMobileMenusEmptyMessage2ListItem(MenuName MenuType)
<$reveal type='match' state="$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!normal_menu" text=$MenuType$ tag=span>
	<$button class='tc-btn-invisible' set=<<inmysocksMobileMenusMakeState """$MenuName$""">> setTo=<<currentTiddler>>>
		{{$:/core/images/right-arrow}}<$view tiddler=<<currentTiddler>> field='caption'><$view tiddler=<<currentTiddler>> field='title'/></$view>
		<$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current' $value={{!!title}}/>
	</$button>
	<br>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type='match' state="$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!table_of_contents" text=$MenuType$>
	<$button class='tc-btn-invisible' set=<<inmysocksMobileMenusMakeState """$MenuName$""">> setTo=<<currentTiddler>>>
		{{$:/core/images/right-arrow}}
		<$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current' $value={{!!title}}/>
	</$button>
	<$link to=<<currentTiddler>>>
		<$view tiddler=<<currentTiddler>> field='caption'><$view tiddler=<<currentTiddler>> field='title'/></$view>
	</$link>
	<br>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type='match' state="$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!table_of_contents_selective" text=$MenuType$>
	<$list filter='[tag{!!title}limit[1]]' variable=dummy emptyMessage="<$button class='tc-btn-invisible'>{{$:/core/images/blank}}</$button>">
		<$button class='tc-btn-invisible' set=<<inmysocksMobileMenusMakeState """$MenuName$""">> setTo=<<currentTiddler>>>
			{{$:/core/images/right-arrow}}
			<$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current' $value={{!!title}}/>
		</$button>
	</$list>
	<$link to=<<currentTiddler>>>
		<$view tiddler=<<currentTiddler>> field='caption'><$view tiddler=<<currentTiddler>> field='title'/></$view>
	</$link>
	<br>
</$reveal>
\end

\define inmysocksMobileMenusEmptyMessage2(MenuName MenuType ListField)
<$reveal type='match' state='$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!empty_field' text="""$ListField$""">
	<$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!table_of_contents_selective_hierarchical' text="""$MenuType$""">
		<$list filter='[tag<CurrentTiddler>]'>
			<<inmysocksMobileMenusEmptyMessage2ListItem """$MenuName$""" """$MenuType$""">>
		</$list>
	</$reveal>
	<$reveal type='match' state='$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!table_of_contents_selective_hierarchical' text="""$MenuType$""">
		<$set name=Filter value="""[prefix[$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/]has[text]]-[[$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current]]""">
			<$set name=TagsFilter value="""[!is[system]]+[tag{$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current}]""">
				<$list filter=<<Filter>> emptyMessage=<<inmysocksMobileMenusHierarchicalEmptyMessage1 """$MenuName$""">>>
					<<inmysocksMobileMenusTemplateHierarchicalListMacro1 """$MenuName$""">>
				</$list>
			</$set>
		</$set>
	</$reveal>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!empty_field' text="""$ListField$""">
	<$tiddler tiddler={{$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current}}>
		<$list filter='[list[!!$ListField$]]'>
			<<inmysocksMobileMenusEmptyMessage2ListItem """$MenuName$""" """$MenuType$""">>
		</$list>
	</$tiddler>
</$reveal>
\end

\define inmysocksMobileMenusTemplateListItemTOCSelectiveIsSpecial(MenuName MenuType ListField)
<$reveal type='match' state='$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!empty_field' text="""$ListField$""">
	<$list filter='[tag<ThisTiddler2>limit[1]]' variable=dummy emptyMessage="<$button class='tc-btn-invisible'>{{$:/core/images/blank}}</$button>">
		<$button class='tc-btn-invisible' set=<<inmysocksMobileMenusMakeState """$MenuName$""">> setTo=<<ThisTiddler2>>>
			{{$:/core/images/right-arrow}}
			<$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current' $value=<<ThisTiddler2>>/>
		</$button>
	</$list>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!empty_field' text="""$ListField$""">
	<$tiddler tiddler={{$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current}}>
		<$list filter='[list[!!$ListField$]limit[1]]' variable=dummy emptyMessage="<$button class='tc-btn-invisible'>{{$:/core/images/blank}}</$button>">
			<$button class='tc-btn-invisible' set=<<inmysocksMobileMenusMakeState """$MenuName$""">> setTo=<<ThisTiddler2>>>
				{{$:/core/images/right-arrow}}
				<$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current' $value=<<ThisTiddler2>>/>
			</$button>
		</$list>
	</$tiddler>
</$reveal>
\end

\define inmysocksMobileMenusTemplateListItem(MenuName MenuType ListField)
<$reveal type='match' state="$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!normal_menu" text=$MenuType$>
	<$button class='tc-btn-invisible' set=<<inmysocksMobileMenusMakeState """$MenuName$""">> setTo=<<ThisTiddler2>>>
		{{$:/core/images/right-arrow}}<$view tiddler=<<ThisTiddler2>> field='caption'><$view tiddler=<<ThisTiddler2>> field='title'/></$view>
		<$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current' $value=<<ThisTiddler2>>/>
	</$button>
	<br>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type='match' state="$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!table_of_contents" text=$MenuType$>
	<$button class='tc-btn-invisible' set=<<inmysocksMobileMenusMakeState """$MenuName$""">> setTo=<<ThisTiddler2>>>
		{{$:/core/images/right-arrow}}
		<$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current' $value=<<ThisTiddler2>>/>
	</$button>
	<$link to=<<ThisTiddler2>>>
		<$view tiddler=<<ThisTiddler2>> field='caption'><$view tiddler=<<ThisTiddler2>> field='title'/></$view>
	</$link>
	<br>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type='match' state="$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!table_of_contents_selective" text=$MenuType$>
	<<inmysocksMobileMenusTemplateListItemTOCSelectiveIsSpecial """$MenuName$""" """$MenuType$""" """$ListField$""">>
	<$link to=<<ThisTiddler2>>>
		<$view tiddler=<<ThisTiddler2>> field='caption'><$view tiddler=<<ThisTiddler2>> field='title'/></$view>
	</$link>
	<br>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type='match' state="$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!table_of_contents_selective_hierarchical" text=$MenuType$>
<!--THIS PART HERE NEEDS TO BE DONE -->
</$reveal>
\end

\define inmysocksMobileMenusTemplate(MenuName MenuType ListField)
<$set name=CurrentTiddler value={{$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current}}>
	<$list filter='[text<CurrentTiddler>removeprefix[$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/]]-[[current]]+[limit[1]]' variable=ParentTiddler emptyMessage=<<inmysocksMobileMenusEmptyMessage2 """$MenuName$""" """$MenuType$""" """$ListField$""">>>
		<$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!table_of_contents_selective_hierarchical' text="""$MenuType$""">
			<$reveal type='match' state='$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!empty_field' text="""$ListField$""">
				<$list filter='[tag<CurrentTiddler>]' variable=ThisTiddler2>
					<<inmysocksMobileMenusTemplateListItem """$MenuName$""" """$MenuType$""" """$ListField$""">>
				</$list>
			</$reveal>
			<$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!empty_field' text="""$ListField$""">
				<$tiddler tiddler={{$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current}}>
					<$list filter='[list[!!$ListField$]]' variable=ThisTiddler2>
						<<inmysocksMobileMenusTemplateListItem """$MenuName$""" """$MenuType$""" """$ListField$""">>
					</$list>
				</$tiddler>
			</$reveal>
		</$reveal>
		<$reveal type='match' state='$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!table_of_contents_selective_hierarchical' text="""$MenuType$""">
			<$set name=Filter value="""[prefix[$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/]has[text]]-[[$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current]]""">
				<$set name=TagsFilter value="""[!is[system]]+[tag{$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current}]""">
					<$list filter=<<Filter>> emptyMessage=<<inmysocksMobileMenusHierarchicalEmptyMessage1 """$MenuName$""">>>
						<<inmysocksMobileMenusTemplateHierarchicalListMacro1 """$MenuName$""">>
					</$list>
				</$set>
			</$set>
		</$reveal>
	</$list>
</$set>
\end

\define inmysocksMobileMenusTemplateHierarchicalListMacro1(MenuName)
<$list filter='[is[current]removeprefix[$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/]]' variable=CurrentTag>
<<inmysocksMobileMenusHierarchicalInnerMacro """$MenuName$""">>
</$list>
\end

\define inmysocksMobileMenusHierarchicalInnerMacro(MenuName)
<$set name=TagsFilter value='$(TagsFilter)$+[tag[$(CurrentTag)$]]'>
<$set name=Filter value='$(Filter)$-[[$(currentTiddler)$]]'>
<$list filter=<<Filter>> emptyMessage=<<inmysocksMobileMenusHierarchicalEmptyMessage2 """$MenuName$""">>>
<<inmysocksMobileMenusTemplateHierarchicalListMacro1 """$MenuName$""">>
</$list>
</$set>
</$set>
\end

\define inmysocksMobileMenusHierarchicalEmptyMessage2(MenuName)
<$list filter=<<TagsFilter>>>
	<$list filter='$(TagsFilter)$+[tag[$(currentTiddler)$]]+[limit[1]]' variable=dummy emptyMessage="<$button class='tc-btn-invisible'>{{$:/core/images/blank}}</$button>">
		<$button class='tc-btn-invisible' set=<<inmysocksMobileMenusMakeState """$MenuName$""">> setTo=<<currentTiddler>>>
			{{$:/core/images/right-arrow}}
			<$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current' $value={{!!title}}/>
		</$button>
	</$list>
	<$link to=<<currentTiddler>>>
		<$view tiddler=<<currentTiddler>> field='caption'><$view tiddler=<<currentTiddler>> field='title'/></$view>
	</$link>
	<br>
</$list>
\end

\define inmysocksMobileMenusHierarchicalEmptyMessage1(MenuName)
<$list filter='[tag{$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current}]'>
	<$list filter='[tag{$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current}]+[tag<currentTiddler>]+[limit[1]]' variable=dummy emptyMessage="<$button class='tc-btn-invisible'>{{$:/core/images/blank}}</$button>">
		<$button class='tc-btn-invisible' set=<<inmysocksMobileMenusMakeState """$MenuName$""">> setTo=<<currentTiddler>>>
			{{$:/core/images/right-arrow}}
			<$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current' $value={{!!title}}/>
		</$button>
	</$list>
	<$link to=<<currentTiddler>>>
		<$view tiddler=<<currentTiddler>> field='caption'><$view tiddler=<<currentTiddler>> field='title'/></$view>
	</$link>
	<br>
</$list>
\end

\define inmysocksMobileMenusRootListEntry(MenuName MenuType)
<$reveal type='match' state="$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!normal_menu" text=$MenuType$>
	<$button class='tc-btn-invisible' set='$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current' setTo={{!!title}}>
		{{$:/core/images/right-arrow}}<$view field='caption'><$view field='title'/></$view>
		<$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current' $value={{!!title}}/>
	</$button>
	<br>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type='match' state="$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!table_of_contents" text=$MenuType$>
	<$button class='tc-btn-invisible' set='$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current' setTo={{!!title}}>
		{{$:/core/images/right-arrow}}
		<$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current' $value={{!!title}}/>
	</$button>
	<$link>
		<$view field='caption'><$view field='title'/></$view>
	</$link>
	<br>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type='match' state="$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!table_of_contents_selective" text=$MenuType$>
	<$list filter='[tag{!!title}limit[1]]' variable=dummy emptyMessage="<$button class='tc-btn-invisible'>{{$:/core/images/blank}}</$button>">
		<$button class='tc-btn-invisible' set='$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current' setTo={{!!title}}>
			{{$:/core/images/right-arrow}}
			<$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current' $value={{!!title}}/>
		</$button>
	</$list>
	<$link>
		<$view field='caption'><$view field='title'/></$view>
	</$link>
	<br>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type='match' state="$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!table_of_contents_selective_hierarchical" text=$MenuType$>
	<$list filter='[tag{!!title}limit[1]]' variable=dummy emptyMessage="<$button class='tc-btn-invisible'>{{$:/core/images/blank}}</$button>">
		<$button class='tc-btn-invisible' set='$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current' setTo={{!!title}}>
			{{$:/core/images/right-arrow}}
			<$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current' $value={{!!title}}/>
		</$button>
	</$list>
	<$link>
		<$view field='caption'><$view field='title'/></$view>
	</$link>
	<br>
</$reveal>
\end

\define MobileMenu(RootTag:"RootTag" MenuName:Menu MenuType:Menu MenuTitle:"" ShowSubtitle:no ShowBody:no ListField:"")
<$reveal type=nomatch state="""$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!include_title""" text="""$MenuTitle$""">
	$MenuTitle$
</$reveal>

<$reveal type='match' state='$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current' text=''>
	<$reveal type='match' state='$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!empty_field' text="""$ListField$""">
		<$list filter='[tag[$RootTag$]]'>
			<<inmysocksMobileMenusRootListEntry """$MenuName$""" """$MenuType$""">>
		</$list>
	</$reveal>
	<$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!empty_field' text="""$ListField$""">
		<$list filter={{!!$ListField$}}>
			<<inmysocksMobileMenusRootListEntry """$MenuName$""" """$MenuType$""">>
		</$list>
	</$reveal>
</$reveal>

<$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current' text=''>
	<$list filter='[is[system]prefix[$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/]has[text]]-[[$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current]]+[limit[1]]' emptyMessage=<<inmysocksMobileMenusEmptyMessage """$MenuName$""" """$MenuType$""">>> </$list>
	<$list filter='[text{$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current}removeprefix[$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/]]-[[current]]+[limit[1]]' variable=ParentTiddler>
		<$reveal type='match' state="$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!normal_menu" text=$MenuType$>
			<$button class='tc-btn-invisible' style='text-align:left'>
				{{$:/core/images/chevron-left}}
				''<$view tiddler={{$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current}} field=caption><$view tiddler={{$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current}} field=title/></$view>''
				<$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current' $value=<<ParentTiddler>>/>
				<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<inmysocksMobileMenusMakeParentState """$MenuName$""">> $value=''/>
			</$button>
			<br>
		</$reveal>
		<$reveal type='match' state="$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!table_of_contents" text=$MenuType$>
			<$button class='tc-btn-invisible'>
				{{$:/core/images/chevron-left}}
				<$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current' $value=<<ParentTiddler>>/>
				<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<inmysocksMobileMenusMakeParentState """$MenuName$""">> $value=''/>
			</$button>
			<$link to={{$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current}}>
				''<$view tiddler={{$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current}} field=caption><$view tiddler={{$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current}} field=title/></$view>''
			</$link>
			<br>
		</$reveal>
		<$reveal type='match' state="$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!table_of_contents_selective" text=$MenuType$>
			<$button class='tc-btn-invisible'>
				{{$:/core/images/chevron-left}}
				<$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current' $value=<<ParentTiddler>>/>
				<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<inmysocksMobileMenusMakeParentState """$MenuName$""">> $value=''/>
			</$button>
			<$link to={{$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current}}>
				''<$view tiddler={{$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current}} field=caption><$view tiddler={{$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current}} field=title/></$view>''
			</$link>
			<br>
		</$reveal>
		<$reveal type='match' state="$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!table_of_contents_selective_hierarchical" text=$MenuType$>
			<$button class='tc-btn-invisible'>
				{{$:/core/images/chevron-left}}
				<$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current' $value=<<ParentTiddler>>/>
				<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<inmysocksMobileMenusMakeParentState """$MenuName$""">> $value=''/>
			</$button>
			<$link to={{$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current}}>
				''<$view tiddler={{$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current}} field=caption><$view tiddler={{$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current}} field=title/></$view>''
			</$link>
			<br>
		</$reveal>
	</$list>

	<$reveal type='match' state='$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!include_subtitle' text=$ShowSubtitle$>
		<$transclude tiddler={{$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current}} field='subtitle' mode=block/>
	</$reveal>

	<$reveal type='match' state='$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!empty_field' text="""$ListField$""">
		<$list filter='[tag{$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current}limit[1]]' variable=ThisTiddler>
			<<inmysocksMobileMenusTemplate """$MenuName$""" """$MenuType$""" """$ListField$""">>
		</$list>
	</$reveal>
	<$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!empty_field' text="""$ListField$""">
		<$tiddler tiddler={{$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current}}>
			<$list filter='[list[!!$ListField$]limit[1]]' variable=ThisTiddler>
				<<inmysocksMobileMenusTemplate """$MenuName$""" """$MenuType$""" """$ListField$""">>
			</$list>
		</$tiddler>
	</$reveal>

	<$reveal type='match' state='$:/macros/inmysocks/MobileMenu!!include_body' text=$ShowBody$>
		<$transclude tiddler={{$:/state/Menu/$MenuName$/current}} mode=block/>
	</$reveal>
</$reveal>
\end

''__Usage:__'' `<<MobileMenu "RootTag" "MenuName" "Type" "MenuTitle" "ShowSubtitle" "ShowBody" "ListField">>`

Parameters:

|!Name |!Description |
|~RootTag |The tag that defines the root of the menu, like the root tag of the table of contents (Default: `RootTag`) |
|~MenuName |A unique name for the menu (Default: `Menu`)|
|Type |The type of menu, currently options are `Menu`, `TOC`, `TOC-Selective` and `TOC-Selective-Hierarchical` (Default: `Menu`) |
|~MenuTitle |This is the title displayed above the menu, not the name that is used to track the state of the menu. Two menus can have the same title and be independent, but if two menus share the same name they won't be independent of each other. (Default: No title shown) |
|~ShowSubtitle |If this is set as `Subtitle` than the subtitle field of the tiddler will be shown in the menu above the list of current menu items (Default: no subtitle shown) |
|~ShowBody |If this is set as `Body` than the body (text field) of the tiddler will be shown in the menu below the list of current menu items (Default: body not shown) |
|~ListField |If a value is given for `ListField` than the list in that field of each tiddler is used to determine what is listed in the corresponding sub-menu. If this is given it overrides anything given for `RootTag` (No default) |

''__Differences for the table of contents versions:__''

*Clicking on the tiddler name opens up the tiddler
*Clicking on the arrow icon moves through the table of contents just like in the normal menu version
*''Only `TOC-Selective` type'' - Icons only appear next to tiddlers that have children in the table of contents (I need to look at the core toc macros to see how they line up the tiddler names when there isn't an icon)

__How it works:__

You give the macro two parameters, `RootTag` and `MenuName`, the root tag determines the items that appear on the first level of the menu. `MenuName` is a unique name for that menu. You don't strictly need to have unique names, but if you don't than every menu that shares a name will change with all of the others. Both `RootTag` and `MenuName` have default values so just using `<<MakeMenu>>` will work if you are willing to have `RootTag` be your root tag.

The organization is the same as in the table of contents macros.

Initially you see the list of tiddlers with the root tag, when you click on one than the list is replaced by the tidders tagged with that item. If you are not at the root than a button labeled with {{$:/core/images/chevron-left}} and the name of the tiddler the current list is tagged with will appear at the top, clicking on this button will move you back one level.

Each entry displays the tiddler name with the content of the tiddler (if any) below the name, and below that a list of any tiddlers tagged with the current tiddler. So if you want something other than just the list of tagged tiddlers to show up just put it in the tiddler where you want it to display.

So to add entries to the menu just make a tiddler and tag it with either `Top Level` to put it on the root menu, or tag it with the appropriate tiddler.

__Some stuff:__

*You can have as many menus as you want by giving each one a unique name
*The menus display the contents of the caption field, if one exists in the tiddler, otherwise it uses the tiddler title.
*The menus will display the caption (or name) of the current tiddler, the subtitle below that, a list of the entries at that level below the subtitle and the contents of the tiddler body below that.
*The menu can go to an arbitrary depth, so add as many levels as you want
*The menu 'remembers' how you got to a where you are, so if you have the same entry two places in the menu when you back out you will go up the menu tree the same way you went down.
*I will probably change the names of things at some point
*This doesn't require the icon menus plugin, I just found it convenient to use the two together.
*I am not good with css, and the tiddlywiki popups go away after you click inside them once, so the floating menu uses a normal reveal to display. If anyone wants to help with the css to make that work nicer that would be awesome.
*I may add an option to let you specify a filter in place of a list, so you could give each tiddler a filter that would determine which tiddlers are listed under it.






\define multicolumnlist(Filter, Number:'2', Class:'', Template:"""<$transclude field=title/>""")
<table class=$Class$>
	<$list 
		filter="""$Filter$ +[first[]]""" 
		variable=RowStart
	>
		<<multicolumnlistInner """$Filter$""" $Number$ """$Template$""">>
	</$list>
</table>
\end

\define multicolumnlistInner(Filter, Number, Template)
<<multicolumnlistRow """$Filter$""" $Number$ """$Template$""">>
<$list 
	filter="""$Filter$ +[allafter<RowStart>nth[$Number$]]""" 
	variable=RowStart
>
	<<multicolumnlistInner """$Filter$""" $Number$ """$Template$""">>
</$list>
\end

\define multicolumnlistEmptyMessage(Filter, Number, Template)
<tr>
	<$list 
		filter="""$Filter$ +[allafter:include<RowStart>]""" 
		emptyMessage=<<multicolumnlistOtherEmptyMessage """$Template$""">>
	>
		<<multicolumnlistItem """$Template$""">>
	</$list>
</tr>
\end

\define multicolumnlistOtherEmptyMessage(Template)
<$tiddler tiddler=<<RowStart>>>
	<<multicolumnlistItem """$Template$""">>
</$tiddler>
\end

\define multicolumnlistItem(Template)
<td>
	<$list filter="""[field:title[$Template$]]""" emptyMessage="""$Template$""" variable=dummy>
		{{||$Template$}}
	</$list>
</td>
\end

\define multicolumnlistRow(Filter, Number, Template)
<$list 
	filter="""$Filter$ +[allafter<RowStart>nth[$Number$]]""" 
	variable=RowEnd 
	emptyMessage=<<multicolumnlistEmptyMessage """$Filter$""" $Number$ """$Template$""">>
>
	<tr>
		<$list 
			filter="""$Filter$ +[allbefore<RowEnd>allafter:include<RowStart>]"""
		>
			<<multicolumnlistItem """$Template$""">>
		</$list>
	</tr>
</$list>
\end



<<multicolumnlist '[!is[system]limit[17]]' 4 'tc-specialtablething'>>

Simple usage example:

```
<<multicolumnlist '[!is[system]limit[23]]' 3>>
```

<<multicolumnlist '[!is[system]limit[23]]' 3>>






\define ExactPhraseSearch()
Search Field:
<$edit-text
  tiddler='$:/temp/ExactSearch'
  field='field'
  tag='input'
/>
(defaults to `title`)
<br>
Search Term:
<$edit-text
  tiddler='$:/temp/ExactSearch'
  field='text'
  tag='input'
/>

<$checkbox
  tiddler='$:/temp/ExactSearch'
  field='include_system'
  checked=true
  unchecked=false
>
  Include System Tiddlers
</$checkbox>

<$set name=field value={{$:/temp/ExactSearch!!field}}>
<<thisPrivateInnerExactPhraseSearch>>
</$set>

\end

\define thisPrivateInnerExactPhraseSearch()
<$list
  filter='[[$:/temp/ExactSearch]has[text]field:include_system[true]]' 
  variable=dummy
>
  $(field)$
  <$list 
    filter="""[regexp:$(field)${$:/temp/ExactSearch}]-[[$:/temp/ExactSearch]]"""
  >

  </$list>
</$list>
<$list
  filter='[[$:/temp/ExactSearch]has[text]!field:include_system[true]]'
  variable=dummy
>
  <$list 
    filter="""[!is[system]regexp:$(field)${$:/temp/ExactSearch}]-[[$:/temp/ExactSearch]]"""
  >

  </$list>
</$list>
\end

This macro adds a search interface to find tiddlers that contain an exact phrase inside a given field.

Usage: `<<ExactPhraseSearch>>`

Output:

<<ExactPhraseSearch>>






so will this be stored? mkkk kkkkvbnm

aaaaaaa asdf






{
    "tiddlers": {
        "$:/plugins/Federation/FederationCore/ActionTiddlerBundleReadMe": {
            "title": "$:/plugins/Federation/FederationCore/ActionTiddlerBundleReadMe",
            "caption": "ActionTiddlerBundle ReadMe",
            "text": "!! What is this?\n\nAn action widget that bundles and unbundles tiddlers.\n\nUsage:\n\n<$action-tiddlerbundle $bundle=BundleName $filter= $overwrite= $separator= $action= $unpackFilter= $type=/>\n\n|!Parameter |!Description |\n|$bundle |The name of the bundle, either for bundle creation or to select which bundle to unpack. (No default)|\n|$filter |The filter used to select which tiddlers are put into the bundle if making a bundle (No default), or which tiddlers to unpack if unpacking a bundle (Default: `[all[]]`)|\n|$overwrite |Set this to `true` to overwrite existing tiddlers from the bundle, set to `false` to leave existing tiddlers unaffected. This has no effect if `$useImport` is set to `true`. (Default: `false`)|\n|$separator |The separator string used between tiddlers in the bundle. (Default: `<!-- TIDDLER SEPARATOR --!>`) |\n|$action |This can be set to `pack` to create a bundle or unpack to unpack a bundle. (Default: `pack`)|\n|$type |`Tiddler` or `JSON` (Default: `Tiddler`) |\n|$delete |When unpacking a bundle, if this is set to `true` the bundle will be deleted after it is unpacked. (default: `false`) |\n|$useImport |If this is set to `true` than the built-in core import funciton is used when unbundling. (default: `false`) |\n\n\n!! What does `$type` mean?\n\nThe bundle can have two forms.\n\n* When `$type` is set to `Tiddler` the bundle is one tiddler whose text field is the content of each tiddler in the bundle in the same format as a `.tid` file. The content of each tiddler is separated by the string given by `$separator`. The default `$separator` value should work in every case.\n* When `$type` is set to `JSON` the bundel is one tiddler whoes text field is a json object where each key is a tiddler name and the value for that key is the tiddler is json format.\n"
        },
        "$:/plugins/Federation/FederationCore/BundleDemo": {
            "title": "$:/plugins/Federation/FederationCore/BundleDemo",
            "caption": "Bundle Demo",
            "text": "!! Tiddler Bundles\n\nBy default tiddlers are fetched in bundles.\n\nBundles are tiddlers that contain other tiddlers, similar to plugins.\nUnlike plugins you do not need to reload a wiki when you fetch or otherwise add\na bundle to it.\n\nName:\n<$edit-text\n  tiddler='$:/state/FederationCore/BundleDemo'\n  field='bundle_name'\n  class='tc-edit-texteditor'\n/>\n\nType:\n<$radio\n  tiddler='$:/state/FederationCore/BundleDemo'\n  field='bundle_type'\n  value='Tiddler'\n>\n  Tiddler\n</$radio>\n<$radio\n  tiddler='$:/state/FederationCore/BundleDemo'\n  field='bundle_type'\n  value='JSON'\n>\n  JSON\n</$radio>\n\nFilter:\n<$edit-text\n  tiddler='$:/state/FederationCore/BundleDemo'\n  field='bundle_filter'\n  class='tc-edit-texteditor'\n/>\n\n<$button>\n  Make Bundle\n  <$action-tiddlerbundle\n    $action='pack'\n    $bundle={{$:/state/FederationCore/BundleDemo!!bundle_name}}\n    $filter={{$:/state/FederationCore/BundleDemo!!bundle_filter}}\n    $type={{$:/state/FederationCore/BundleDemo!!bundle_type}}\n  />\n</$button>\n\n!! Existing bundlers\n\n<$list\n  filter='[tag[Tiddler Bundle]]'\n>\n\n</$list>\n\n!! Unbundling\n\n<$select\n  tiddler='$:/state/FederationCore/UnbundleName'\n>\n  <option\n    value=''\n  >\n    No Bundle Selected\n  </option>\n  <$list\n    filter='[tag[Tiddler Bundle]]'\n  >\n    <option>\n      <$view\n        field='title'\n      />\n    </option>\n  </$list>\n</$select>\n<br/>\n<$checkbox\n  tiddler='$:/state/FederationCore/BundleDemo'\n  field='use_import'\n  checked='true'\n  unchecked='false'\n>\n  Use Native Import\n</$checkbox>\n<br/>\n<$checkbox\n  tiddler='$:/state/FederationCore/BundleDemo'\n  field='delete_bundle'\n  checked='true'\n  unchecked='false'\n>\n  Delete Bundle After Import\n</$checkbox>\n<br/>\n<$checkbox\n  tiddler='$:/state/FederationCore/BundleDemo'\n  field='overwrite'\n  checked='true'\n  unchecked='false'\n>\n  Overwrite Existing Tiddlers\n</$checkbox>\n<br/>\n<$button>\n  Unbundle Tiddlers\n  <$action-tiddlerbundle\n    $action='unpack'\n    $bundle={{$:/state/FederationCore/UnbundleName}}\n    $useImport={{$:/state/FederationCore/BundleDemo!!use_import}}\n    $filter={{$:/state/FederationCore/BundleDemo!!unbundle_filter}}\n    $delete={{$:/state/FederationCore/BundleDemo!!delete_bundle}}\n    $overwrite={{$:/state/FederationCore/BundleDemo!!overwrite}}\n  />\n</$button>\n\nTitles in the bundle:\n\n<$list\n  filter='[list{$:/state/FederationCore/UnbundleName}]'\n>\n\n</$list>\n"
        },
        "$:/plugins/Federation/FederationCore/FetchDemo": {
            "title": "$:/plugins/Federation/FederationCore/FetchDemo",
            "caption": "Fetch Demo",
            "text": "!! Fetching\n\nThis is a url you can use for testing: `https://ooktech.xyz:8443/Public`\n\nRemote Wiki: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/state/TWederation/FetchTiddlers' field='url' class='tc-edit-texteditor'/>\n\nThis filter works for testing: `[!is[system]limit[10]]`\n\nFilter: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/state/TWederation/FetchTiddlers' field='filter' class='tc-edit-texteditor'/>\n\nBundle Name: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/state/TWederation/FetchTiddlers' field='bundle_name' class='tc-edit-texteditor'/>\n\nBundle Function:\n<$radio tiddler='$:/state/TWederation/FetchTiddlers' field='bundle_function' value='bundleTiddlers'> Tiddler Bundle</$radio>\n<$radio tiddler='$:/state/TWederation/FetchTiddlers' field='bundle_function' value='JSONBundle'> JSON Bundle</$radio>\n\n<$button>\n  Fetch Some Tiddlers\n  <$action-sendmessage\n    $message='tm-send-request'\n    request_type='request_bundle'\n    url={{$:/state/TWederation/FetchTiddlers!!url}}\n    filter={{$:/state/TWederation/FetchTiddlers!!filter}}\n    bundleName={{$:/state/TWederation/FetchTiddlers!!bundle_name}}\n    bundleFunction={{$:/state/TWederation/FetchTiddlers!!bundle_function}}\n  />\n</$button>\n\nThis lists the existing bundles that have already been fetched:\n\n<$list\n  filter='[tag[Tiddler Bundle]][tag[JSON Bundle]]'\n>\n\n</$list>\n\n!! Unbundling\n\nSee the [[Bundle Demo|$:/plugins/Federation/FederationCore/BundleDemo]] for\nmore about bundles.\n\n<$select tiddler='$:/state/TWederation/UnbundleName'>\n  <option\n    value=''\n  >\n    No Bundle Selected\n  </option>\n  <$list\n    filter='[tag[Tiddler Bundle]][tag[JSON Bundle]]'\n  >\n    <option>\n      <$view\n        field='title'\n      />\n    </option>\n  </$list>\n</$select>\n\n<$button>\n  Unbundle Tiddlers\n  <$action-tiddlerbundle\n    $action='unpack'\n    $bundle={{$:/state/TWederation/UnbundleName}}\n  />\n</$button>\n\nTitles in the bundle:\n\n<$list\n  filter='[[$:/TiddlerBundleData/]addsuffix{$:/state/TWederation/UnbundleName}]'\n>\n  <$list\n    filter='[list<currentTiddler>]'\n  >\n\n  </$list>\n</$list>\n"
        },
        "$:/plugins/Federation/FederationCore/HowDoesItWork": {
            "title": "$:/plugins/Federation/FederationCore/HowDoesItWork",
            "caption": "How does it work?",
            "text": "!! How does TWederation work?\n\nThis is a quick and incomplete description of the back-end parts.\n\n!!! Who is this for?\n\nThis is a more in-depths discussion than is required for most peope.\nThis is only for people who are curious about how TWederation works on the back-\nend and for developers who want to know how it works to copy parts of it or\nextend it.\n\n!!! The basic idea\n\nEach wiki is accessible as a static html file.\nThe wikis can be on the local machine, served by a static file server or built\non demand like some of the more advanced features of the Bob server.\nAs long as when the browser loads the wiki it is an html file than it will\nwork.\n\nFor any single communication action there are two wikis involved, the\n`local wiki` which is the wiki fetching tiddlers and that initiating the\ncommunication, and the `remote wiki` which is the wiki that tiddlers are being\nfetched from.\n\nBoth the local and remote wikis must have the FederationCore plugin.\nThe local wikis creates an invisible iframe and loads the remote wiki inside it.\nThe FederationCore plugin adds a daemon process to the loaded wikis that adds\nhandlers for browser messaging across the iframe boundary.\n\nThen the local wiki sends a message to the remote wiki through the iframe\nrequesting tiddlers and the wiki inside the iframe packages the requested\ntiddlers into a bundle and sends a message through the iframe to the local wiki\nthat contains a bundle with the requested tiddlers.\nThe local wiki saves this bundle to be unpacked later.\n\n!!! More detail\n\n!!!! The iframe\n\nThe remote wiki is loaded from wherever it is being served and put into an\niframe.\nThis is because for the messaging to work the wiki has to be fully loaded and\nboot so that the messaging daemon process starts running for the remote wiki.\n\n!!!! Browser messaging\n\nCommunication through the iframe border is done using the `postMessage`\nfunction and the messages are received as `message` events.\n\nThe messages currently used have a `verb` that lists what type of message it\nis. This should probably be changed.\n\n!!!! http/https problems\n\nBrowser security restrictions make it so that you can not load content into an\niframe that is served over http if the containing page is served using https.\n"
        },
        "$:/plugins/Federation/FederationCore/ReadMe": {
            "title": "$:/plugins/Federation/FederationCore/ReadMe",
            "caption": "ReadMe",
            "text": "!! What is this?\n\nThis is the basic core for adding federation to tiddlywiki. This plugin has\nonly the back-end tools necessary to allow other wikis with this plugin to\nfetch tiddlers from this wiki, or to use this wiki to fetch tiddlers from other\nwikis with this plugin.\n\nThis plugin uses the `$action-tiddlerbundle` widget for part of its function.\nSee the\n[[readme|$:/plugins/Federation/FederationCore/ActionTiddlerBundleReadMe]] and\n[[demo|$:/plugins/Federation/FederationCore/BundleDemo]] for more about that.\n\n!! Parameters\n\n|!Parameter |!Description |\n|!url |The url of the remote wiki you wish to fetch from. (No Default) |\n|!filter |The filter used to determine which tiddlers from the remote wiki are returned. (Default: `[is[system]!is[system]]` so nothing is returned) |\n|!bundleName |The name of the tiddler returned as the bundle. (`Default Bundle` for bundles that use the `Tiddler` packing, `JSON Bundle` for bundles that use `JSONBundle` for the bundle function.) |\n|!bundleFunction |The function you want used to bundle the returned tiddlers. By default the options are `bundleTiddlers` and `JSONBundle` (Default: `bundleTiddlers`) |\n|!bundleHandler |The name of the bundle handler to use with the returned bundle. Only `default` is in the FederationCore plugins, other handlers will be in other plugins. (Default: `default`)|\n|!separator |The string used to separate the tiddler text in the bundle when `bundleTiddlers` is used. This should never have to be changed. (Default: `<!-- TIDDLER SEPARATOR --!>`) |\n\n!! How do I do anything with this?\n\nThe code below is used in [[the fetch demo|$:/plugins/Federation/FederationCore/FetchDemo]]\n\nThere are two (or more) wikis. The one you are using is the `local wiki` and\nall the others are `remote wikis`. All the wikis involved must have this\nplugin.\n\nIn the `local wiki` you have something like this:\n\n```\nThis is a url you can use for testing: `https://ooktech.xyz:8443/Public`\n\nRemote Wiki: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/state/TWederation/FetchTiddlers' field='url' class='tc-edit-texteditor'/>\n\nThis filter works for testing: `[!is[system]limit[10]]`\n\nFilter: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/state/TWederation/FetchTiddlers' field='filter' class='tc-edit-texteditor'/>\n\nBundle Name: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/state/TWederation/FetchTiddlers' field='bundle_name' class='tc-edit-texteditor'/>\n\nBundle Function:\n<$radio tiddler='$:/state/TWederation/FetchTiddlers' field='bundle_function' value='bundleTiddlers'> Tiddler Bundle</$radio>\n<$radio tiddler='$:/state/TWederation/FetchTiddlers' field='bundle_function' value='JSONBundle'> JSON Bundle</$radio>\n\n<$button>\n  Fetch Some Tiddlers\n  <$action-sendmessage\n    $message='tm-send-request'\n    request_type='request_bundle'\n    url={{$:/state/TWederation/FetchTiddlers!!url}}\n    filter={{$:/state/TWederation/FetchTiddlers!!filter}}\n    bundleName={{$:/state/TWederation/FetchTiddlers!!bundle_name}}\n    bundleFunction={{$:/state/TWederation/FetchTiddlers!!bundle_function}}\n  />\n</$button>\n\nThis lists the existing bundles that have already been fetched:\n\n<$list\n  filter='[tag[Tiddler Bundle]][tag[JSON Bundle]]'\n>\n\n</$list>\n```\n\nWhen you click the button the `local wiki` fetches the tiddlers in the `remote\nwiki` returned by the filter.\nThese tiddlers are put into a bundle and must be unpacked before they are\nusable in the local wiki.\nThis is a necessary safety feature.\n\nTo unbundle the tiddlers you use the `$action-tiddlerbundle` action widget like\nthis:\n\n```\n<$select\n  tiddler='$:/state/TWederation/UnbundleName'\n>\n  <option\n    value=''\n  >\n    No Bundle Selected\n  </option>\n  <$list\n    filter='[tag[Tiddler Bundle]][tag[JSON Bundle]]'\n  >\n    <option>\n      <$view\n        field='title'\n      />\n    </option>\n  </$list>\n</$select>\n\n<$button>\n  Unbundle Tiddlers\n  <$action-tiddlerbundle\n    $action='unpack'\n    $bundle={{$:/state/TWederation/UnbundleName}}\n  />\n</$button>\n\nTitles in the bundle:\n\n<$list\n  filter='[[$:/TiddlerBundleData/]addsuffix{$:/state/TWederation/UnbundleName}]'\n>\n  <$list\n    filter='[list<currentTiddler>]'\n  >\n\n  </$list>\n</$list>\n```\n\n!! Uses for this plugin are:\n\n*Add this plugin to a wiki that you want to be able to pull content from (the source wiki)\n*Add this plugin to a wiki that will use one of the other federation plugins (because it is required by all other federation plugins)\n*Use this plugin to create your own tool that uses federation\n"
        },
        "$:/plugins/Federation/FederationCore/action-tiddlerbundle.js": {
            "title": "$:/plugins/Federation/FederationCore/action-tiddlerbundle.js",
            "text": "/*\\\ntitle: $:/plugins/Federation/FederationCore/action-tiddlerbundle.js\ntype: application/javascript\nmodule-type: widget\n\n$filter and $unpackFilter should be combined since the widget will always either unpack of pack something, never both.\n\nUsage:\n\n<$action-tiddlerbundle $bundle=BundleName $filter= $overwrite= $separator= $action= $unpackFilter= $type=/>\n\n|!Parameter |!Description |\n|$bundle |The name of the bundle, either for bundle creation or to select which bundle to unpack. (No default)|\n|$filter |The filter used to select which tiddlers are put into the bundle if making a bundle, or which tiddlers to unpack if unpacking a bundle (No default)|\n|$overwrite |Set this to `true` to overwrite existing tiddlers from the bundle, set to `false` to leave existing tiddlers unaffected. (Default: `false`)|\n|$separator |The separator string used between tiddlers in the bundle. (Default: `<!-- TIDDLER SEPARATOR --!>`) |\n|$action |Pack (create bundle) or unpack (unpack tiddlers) (Default: `Pack`)|\n|$type |`Tiddler` or `JSON` (Default: `Tiddler`) |\n|$delete |When unpacking a bundle, if this is set to `true` the bundle will be deleted after it is unpacked. (default: `false`) |\n|$useImport |If this is set to `true` than the built-in core import funciton is used when unbundling. (default: `false`) |\n\n\\*/\n\n(function(){\n\n/*jslint node: true, browser: true */\n/*global $tw: false */\n\"use strict\";\n\nconst Widget = require(\"$:/core/modules/widgets/widget.js\").widget;\n\nconst ActionTiddlerBundle = function(parseTreeNode,options) {\n  this.initialise(parseTreeNode,options);\n};\n\n/*\nInherit from the base widget class\n*/\nActionTiddlerBundle.prototype = new Widget();\n\n/*\nRender this widget into the DOM\n*/\nActionTiddlerBundle.prototype.render = function(parent,nextSibling) {\n  this.computeAttributes();\n  this.execute();\n};\n\n/*\nCompute the internal state of the widget\n*/\nActionTiddlerBundle.prototype.execute = function() {\n  this.actionBundle = this.getAttribute(\"$bundle\");\n  this.filter = this.getAttribute(\"$filter\");\n  this.actionOverwrite = this.getAttribute(\"$overwrite\", false);\n  this.actionSeparator = this.getAttribute(\"$separator\");\n  this.actionAction = this.getAttribute(\"$action\", \"pack\");\n  this.bundleType = this.getAttribute(\"$type\", \"Tiddler\");\n  this.deleteBundle = this.getAttribute(\"$delete\", \"false\");\n  this.useImport = this.getAttribute(\"$useImport\", false);\n};\n\n/*\nRefresh the widget by ensuring our attributes are up to date\n*/\nActionTiddlerBundle.prototype.refresh = function(changedTiddlers) {\n  const changedAttributes = this.computeAttributes();\n  if(Object.keys(changedAttributes).length > 0) {\n    this.refreshSelf();\n    return true;\n  }\n  return this.refreshChildren(changedTiddlers);\n};\n\nfunction unpackTiddler(self, tiddler) {\n  if (self.useImport === 'true') {\n    tiddler = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(tiddler))\n    self.dispatchEvent({type: \"tm-import-tiddlers\", param: JSON.stringify(tiddler)});\n  } else if (self.actionOverwrite || !self.wiki.getTiddler(tiddler.fields.title)) {\n    self.wiki.addTiddler(new $tw.Tiddler(tiddler.fields));\n  }\n}\n\n/*\nInvoke the action associated with this widget\n*/\nActionTiddlerBundle.prototype.invokeAction = function(triggeringWidget,event) {\n  if (this.actionAction === 'pack') {\n    const separator = (typeof this.actionSeparator === 'undefined')?'<!-- TIDDLER SEPARATOR --!>':this.actionSeparator;\n    const bundleType = this.bundleType ? this.bundleType:'Tiddler';\n    const bundleFilter = this.filter;\n    const bundleTiddlers = this.wiki.filterTiddlers(bundleFilter);\n    let bundleText = '';\n    const bundleObject = {};\n    for (var i = 0; i < bundleTiddlers.length; i++) {\n      if (this.bundleType === \"JSON\") {\n        const currentBundleTiddler = this.wiki.getTiddler(decodeURI(bundleTiddlers[i]));\n        bundleObject[bundleTiddlers[i]] = currentBundleTiddler;\n      } else {\n        const currentBundleTiddler = this.wiki.getTiddler(decodeURI(bundleTiddlers[i]));\n        // Make the tiddler text and escape any places the separator strings\n        // shows up in the tiddler.\n        const re = new RegExp(separator, 'g')\n        const tidText = (currentBundleTiddler.getFieldStringBlock({exclude: [\"text\"]}) + (!!currentBundleTiddler.fields.text ? \"\\n\\n\" + currentBundleTiddler.fields.text : \"\")).replace(re, '\\\\'+separator)\n        bundleText += tidText + '\\n' + separator + '\\n';\n      }\n    }\n    if (this.bundleType === \"JSON\") {\n      bundleText = JSON.stringify(bundleObject, null, 2);\n    }\n    const fields = {\n      title: this.actionBundle,\n      text: bundleText,\n      list: $tw.utils.stringifyList(bundleTiddlers),\n      tags: '[[Tiddler Bundle]]',\n      separator: separator,\n      bundle_type: bundleType,\n      bundle_name: this.actionBundle,\n      type: 'text/plain'\n    };\n    this.wiki.addTiddler(fields);\n  } else if (this.actionAction === 'unpack') {\n    const self = this\n    const filterOutput = this.filter ? true:false;\n    const unpackList = (filterOutput)? this.wiki.filterTiddlers(this.filter): []\n    const unpackIt = (filterOutput === false || (unpackList.indexOf(tiddlerName) !== -1))\n    const tiddler = $tw.wiki.getTiddler(this.actionBundle);\n    const separator = (typeof tiddler.fields.separator === 'undefined')?'<!-- TIDDLER SEPARATOR --!>':tiddler.fields.separator;\n    if (tiddler) {\n      //Get the raw text for the bundle.\n      const bundleText = tiddler.getFieldString('text');\n      if (tiddler.fields.bundle_type === 'JSON') {\n        const bundleObject = JSON.parse(tiddler.fields.text);\n        for (let tiddlerName in bundleObject) {\n          if (unpackIt) {\n            unpackTiddler(self, bundleObject[tiddlerName])\n          }\n        }\n      } else {\n        //Get the raw text for each tiddler.\n        const rawBundleTiddlers = bundleText.split('\\n' + separator + '\\n');\n        //Create a tiddler from each tiddler. Only overwrite existing tiddlers if this.actionOverwrite is true\n        for (let i = 0; i < rawBundleTiddlers.length; i++) {\n          if (rawBundleTiddlers[i].trim() !== '') {\n            const re = new RegExp('\\\\\\\\' + separator, 'g')\n            const tiddlers = this.wiki.deserializeTiddlers('.tid',rawBundleTiddlers[i].replace(re,separator));\n            $tw.utils.each(tiddlers,function(tiddler) {\n              if (unpackIt) {\n                unpackTiddler(self, {fields: tiddler})\n              }\n            });\n          }\n        }\n      }\n      if (this.deleteBundle === 'true') {\n        this.wiki.deleteTiddler(this.actionBundle)\n      }\n    }\n  }\n  return true; // Action was invoked\n};\n\nexports[\"action-tiddlerbundle\"] = ActionTiddlerBundle;\n\n})();\n",
            "type": "application/javascript",
            "module-type": "widget"
        },
        "$:/plugins/Federation/FederationCore/bundleOptions.js": {
            "title": "$:/plugins/Federation/FederationCore/bundleOptions.js",
            "text": "/*\\\ntitle: $:/plugins/Federation/FederationCore/bundleOptions.js\ntype: application/javascript\nmodule-type: utils\n\nThese are functions that define how tiddlers are bundled when a tiddler bundle is requested.\nbundleTiddlers is the default one. The function should create the Bundle object which is added as a tiddler in the receiving wiki.\n\nIf you want to add more options without chaing this you can create a new tiddler, just copy this one, change the title, the title listed in the first line at the top and replace\nthe function bundleTiddlers with your function. This way we can have multiple plugins use the same communication mechanism without all having to modify the smae tiddlers to work.\n\nYou can use this as a function template:\n\nFor new ones just use $tw.wiki.functionName = function (event) {\n  <<function Content>>\n  event.source.postMessage({verb:\"DELIVER_BUNDLE\", bundle: Bundle, origin: event.data.destination},\"*\");\n}\n\n\\*/\n(function(){\n\n/*jslint node: true, browser: true */\n/*global $tw: false */\n\"use strict\";\n\nexports.name = \"bundleOptions\";\nexports.platforms = [\"browser\"];\nexports.before = [\"browser-messaging\"];\nexports.synchronous = true;\n\n$tw.wiki.bundleHandler = $tw.wiki.bundleHandler || {};\n$tw.wiki.bundleFunction = $tw.wiki.bundleFunction || {};\n\n$tw.wiki.bundleHandler.full = function(event) {\n  const creationFields = $tw.wiki.getCreationFields();\n  event.data.bundle.title = event.data.bundle.title + ' - ' + event.data.origin;\n  $tw.wiki.addTiddler(new $tw.Tiddler(creationFields, event.data.bundle));\n  const historyTiddler = $tw.wiki.getTiddler('$:/FetchHistory/' + event.data.origin);\n  let newText = {};\n  if (historyTiddler) {\n    newText = JSON.parse(historyTiddler.fields.text);\n    newText[event.data.filter] = event.data.bundle.most_recent ? event.data.bundle.most_recent:'0';\n  } else {\n    newText[event.data.filter] = event.data.bundle.most_recent ? event.data.bundle.most_recent:'0';\n    historyTiddler = {\n      title: '$:/FetchHistory/' + event.data.origin,\n      type: 'application/json',\n      text: ''\n    };\n  }\n  $tw.wiki.addTiddler(new $tw.Tiddler(historyTiddler, {text: JSON.stringify(newText)}));\n};\n\n$tw.wiki.bundleFunction.bundleTiddlers = function(event, status_message) {\n  const status = status_message || '';\n  const separator = event.data.separator ? event.data.separator : '<!-- TIDDLER SEPARATOR --!>';\n  const bundleFilter = event.data.filter ? event.data.filter : '[is[system]!is[system]]';\n  const bundleTitle = event.data.bundlename ? event.data.bundlename : \"Default Bundle\";\n  const bundleTiddlers = $tw.wiki.filterTiddlers(bundleFilter);\n  for (let i = 0; i < bundleTiddlers.length; i++) {\n    bundleTiddlers[i] = decodeURI(bundleTiddlers[i]);\n  }\n  let bundleText = '';\n  for (let i = 0; i < bundleTiddlers.length; i++) {\n    const currentBundleTiddler = $tw.wiki.getTiddler(decodeURI(bundleTiddlers[i]));\n    // Make the tiddler text and escape any places the separator strings\n    // shows up in the tiddler.\n\t\tconst re = new RegExp(separator, 'g')\n    const tidText = (currentBundleTiddler.getFieldStringBlock({exclude: [\"text\"]}) + (!!currentBundleTiddler.fields.text ? \"\\n\\n\" + currentBundleTiddler.fields.text : \"\")).replace(re, '\\\\' + separator)\n    bundleText += tidText + '\\n' + separator + '\\n';\n  }\n  const Bundle = {\n    title: bundleTitle,\n    text: bundleText,\n    list: $tw.utils.stringifyList(bundleTiddlers),\n    tags: '[[Tiddler Bundle]]',\n    separator: separator,\n    type: 'text/plain',\n    status: status,\n    origin: event.data.destination,\n    bundle_function: event.data.bundleFunction,\n    unbundle_function: 'full',\n    filter: bundleFilter,\n    bundle_size: bundleTiddlers.length\n  };\n  const messageObject = {\n    verb:\"DELIVER_BUNDLE\",\n    bundle: Bundle,\n    origin: event.data.destination,\n    type: 'full',\n    filter: bundleFilter\n  };\n  event.source.postMessage(messageObject,\"*\");\n};\n\n$tw.wiki.bundleFunction.JSONBundle = function(event, status_message) {\n  const status = status_message || '';\n  const separator = event.data.separator ? event.data.separator : '<!-- TIDDLER SEPARATOR --!>';\n  const bundleFilter = event.data.filter ? event.data.filter : '[is[system]!is[system]]';\n  const bundleTitle = event.data.bundlename ? event.data.bundlename : \"JSON Bundle\";\n  const bundleTiddlers = $tw.wiki.filterTiddlers(bundleFilter);\n  for (let i = 0; i < bundleTiddlers.length; i++) {\n    bundleTiddlers[i] = decodeURI(bundleTiddlers[i]);\n  }\n  const bundleObject = {};\n  for (let i = 0; i < bundleTiddlers.length; i++) {\n    bundleObject[bundleTiddlers[i]] = $tw.wiki.getTiddler(decodeURI(bundleTiddlers[i]));\n  };\n  const Bundle = {\n    title: bundleTitle,\n    text: JSON.stringify(bundleObject, null, 2),\n    list: $tw.utils.stringifyList(bundleTiddlers),\n    tags: '[[JSON Bundle]]',\n    separator: separator,\n    type: 'text/plain',\n    status: status,\n    bundle_size: bundleTiddlers.length\n  };\n  const messageObject = {\n    verb:\"DELIVER_BUNDLE\",\n    bundle: Bundle,\n    origin: event.data.destination,\n    type: 'JSON Bundle'\n  };\n  event.source.postMessage(messageObject,\"*\");\n};\n\n})();\n",
            "type": "application/javascript",
            "module-type": "utils"
        },
        "$:/plugins/Federation/FederationCore/communications-daemon.js": {
            "title": "$:/plugins/Federation/FederationCore/communications-daemon.js",
            "text": "/*\\\ntitle: $:/plugins/Federation/FederationCore/communications-daemon.js\ntype: application/javascript\nmodule-type: startup\n\nThis is the background process that is in charge of xmlhttprequests and handling responses from external sources.\n\n\\*/\n(function () {\n\n  /*jslint node: true, browser: true */\n  /*global $tw: false */\n  \"use strict\";\n\n  // Export name and synchronous status\n  exports.name = \"communications-daemon\";\n  exports.platforms = [\"browser\"];\n  exports.after = [\"startup\"];\n  exports.synchronous = true;\n\n  $tw.windowMessageHandlers = $tw.windowMessageHandlers || {};\n  $tw.wiki.CommunicationsHandlerTypes = $tw.wiki.CommunicationsHandlerTypes || {};\n  $tw.wiki.CommunicationsHandler = $tw.wiki.CommunicationsHandler || {};\n  $tw.wiki.PendingCommunicationsRequest = 0;\n\n  // Configuration tiddler\n  const CONFIGURATION_TIDDLER = \"$:/plugins/Federation/FederationCore/CommunicationsDaemonSettings\";\n  const configurationTiddler = $tw.wiki.getTiddler(CONFIGURATION_TIDDLER);\n\n  //This function gets called whenever something is added to the communications queue or a response is heard from an outside source to a previous request.\n  function ProcessCommunicationsQueue() {\n    if (Object.keys($tw.wiki.event_queue).length !== 0) {\n      //send the next request if there is one and no request is currently pending\n      if ($tw.wiki.event_queue[Object.keys($tw.wiki.event_queue)[0]].data) {\n        $tw.wiki.CommunicationsHandler['request_bundle']($tw.wiki.event_queue[Object.keys($tw.wiki.event_queue)[0]].data);\n        delete $tw.wiki.event_queue[Object.keys($tw.wiki.event_queue)[0]];\n      }\n    }\n  }\n\n  function loadIFrame(url,callback) {\n    // Check if iframe already exists\n    let iframeInfo = $tw.browserMessaging.iframeInfoMap[url];\n    if(iframeInfo) {\n      // We've already got the iframe\n      callback(null,iframeInfo);\n    } else {\n      // Create the iframe and save it in the list\n      const iframe = document.createElement(\"iframe\"),\n        iframeInfo = {\n          url: url,\n          status: \"loading\",\n          domNode: iframe\n        };\n      $tw.browserMessaging.iframeInfoMap[url] = iframeInfo;\n      saveIFrameInfoTiddler(iframeInfo);\n      // Add the iframe to the DOM and hide it\n      iframe.style.display = \"none\";\n      document.body.appendChild(iframe);\n      // Set up onload\n      iframe.onload = function() {\n        iframeInfo.status = \"loaded\";\n        saveIFrameInfoTiddler(iframeInfo);\n        callback(null,iframeInfo);\n      };\n      iframe.onerror = function() {\n        callback(\"Cannot load iframe\");\n      };\n      try {\n        iframe.src = url;\n      } catch(ex) {\n        callback(ex);\n      }\n    }\n  }\n\n  function saveIFrameInfoTiddler(iframeInfo) {\n    $tw.wiki.addTiddler(new $tw.Tiddler($tw.wiki.getCreationFields(),{\n      title: \"$:/temp/ServerConnection/\" + iframeInfo.url,\n      text: iframeInfo.status,\n      tags: [\"$:/tags/ServerConnection\"],\n      url: iframeInfo.url\n    },$tw.wiki.getModificationFields()));\n  }\n\n  exports.startup = function() {\n    /*\n    The new idea is that I make a worker that will use an xmlhttprequest to load the html of a remote wiki then when that is loaded it will pass that back to the page and the page will use the srcdoc attribute of an iframe to load the wiki, then it will use postMessage the same way as now. This may keep the browser from becoming unresponsive while fetching bundles from other wikis because the webworkers will take care of the heavy lifting. Or at least part of it.\n    This doesn't work unless CORS things are properly set. They generally aren't so I can't do much with it.\n    */\n\n    /*\n    This will be the object that holds the event queue information. It will hold pending requests to be sent. Requests will be added using the tm-send-request message and after being sent the daemon will wait for a response (or a timeout) before moving on to the next request. This is to prevent collisions from responses. It is probably better to create web workers to service each request so we can do multiple requests simultaneously (limit the number of simultaneous workers), but I need to make sure that web workers won't cause other problems by being created using blobs and data uris on https servers.\n\n    The structure of each element should be {url, xmlhttprequest data} for  now, this may get updated later.\n    */\n    $tw.wiki.event_queue = $tw.wiki.event_queue || {};\n\n    // Reset the values when any of the tiddlers change.\n    $tw.rootWidget.addEventListener(\"tm-send-request\",function(event) {\n      //If the configuration changes do a full refresh, otherwise just refresh the changed expression.\n      const paramObject = event.paramObject || {};\n      const request_type = paramObject.request_type;\n\n      if (request_type) {\n        if (typeof $tw.wiki.CommunicationsHandlerTypes[request_type] === 'function') {\n          $tw.wiki.CommunicationsHandlerTypes[request_type](event);\n        } else {\n          console.log('No handler exists for that type of request.');\n        }\n      } else {\n        console.log('No request type given.');\n      }\n      ProcessCommunicationsQueue();\n    });\n\n    //With only one handler here this semes a bit clunky, but by making it this way we can have plugins add different event types that can be handled by the same extensible code without changing the core.\n    $tw.wiki.CommunicationsHandlerTypes['request_bundle'] = function(event) {\n      if ($tw.wiki.event_queue[event.paramObject.url]) {\n        //There is already a queued request for that url. Ignore it for now to prevent repeated requests but we need to come up with a more elegant way to handle this in the future.\n        console.log('There is already a request for that URL');\n      } else {\n        //The event is placed into the event queue object to be handled by the daemon\n        $tw.wiki.event_queue[event.paramObject.url] = {'type':'request_bundle','data':event};\n      }\n    };\n\n    //Is this where we should add a callback function to make things work better?\n    //I think that the callback in loadIFrame takes care of anything that this would do.\n    $tw.wiki.CommunicationsHandler['request_bundle'] = function(event) {\n      const paramObject = event.paramObject || {},\n        url = paramObject.url;\n      if(url) {\n        loadIFrame(url,function(err,iframeInfo) {\n          if(err) {\n            alert(\"Error loading tiddler bundle: \" + url);\n          } else {\n            iframeInfo.domNode.contentWindow.postMessage({\n              verb: \"BUNDLE_REQUEST\",\n              filter: event.paramObject.filter,\n              bundlename: event.paramObject.bundleName,\n              separator: event.paramObject.separator,\n              destination: url,\n              bundleFunction: event.paramObject.bundleFunction,\n            }, \"*\");\n          }\n        });\n      }\n    };\n\n    window.addEventListener(\"message\",function listener(event){\n      if (typeof $tw.windowMessageHandlers[event.data.verb] === 'function') {\n        $tw.windowMessageHandlers[event.data.verb](event);\n      }\n    },false);\n\n  };\n})();\n",
            "type": "application/javascript",
            "module-type": "startup"
        },
        "$:/plugins/Federation/FederationCore/federationWindowMessageHandlers.js": {
            "title": "$:/plugins/Federation/FederationCore/federationWindowMessageHandlers.js",
            "text": "/*\\\ntitle: $:/plugins/Federation/FederationCore/federationWindowMessageHandlers.js\ntype: application/javascript\nmodule-type: utils\n\nThese are functions that handle messages that are sent using the postMessage\nfunction to communicate across the iframe boundary.\n\nThis can be extended by creating a plugin that has more functions. Use this\nfile as the template and changing the names as appropriate.\n\nYou can use this as a function template:\n\nFor new ones just use $tw.wiki.functionName = function (event) {\n  <<function Content>>\n  event.source.postMessage({verb:\"DELIVER_BUNDLE\", bundle: Bundle, origin: event.data.destination},\"*\");\n}\n\n\\*/\n(function(){\n\n/*jslint node: true, browser: true */\n/*global $tw: false */\n\"use strict\";\n\nexports.name = \"federationWindowMessageHandlers\";\nexports.platforms = [\"browser\"];\nexports.before = [\"browser-messaging\"];\nexports.synchronous = true;\n\nfunction closeIFrame(url) {\n  const iframe = document.body.getElementsByTagName('iframe');\n  for (let j = 0; j < iframe.length; j++) {\n    if (iframe[j].src === url) {\n      document.body.removeChild(iframe[j]);\n      $tw.browserMessaging.iframeInfoMap[url] = null;\n    }\n  }\n}\n\n$tw.windowMessageHandlers = $tw.windowMessageHandlers || {};\n$tw.bundleHandler = $tw.bundleHandler || {};\n\n$tw.windowMessageHandlers.BUNDLE_REQUEST = function (event) {\n  if (event.data.bundleFunction) {\n    const bundleFunction = $tw.wiki.bundleFunction[event.data.bundleFunction];\n    if (typeof bundleFunction === \"function\") {\n      bundleFunction(event, 'Ok');\n    } else {\n      //If an invalid is given use the default function\n      $tw.wiki.bundleFunction.bundleTiddlers(event, 'invalid bundle function given, using default function as fallback. Bundle function: ' + event.data.bundleFunction);\n    }\n  } else {\n    //If no bundleFunction is given use the default function\n    $tw.wiki.bundleFunction.bundleTiddlers(event, 'no bundle function given, used default.');\n  }\n}\n\n$tw.windowMessageHandlers.DELIVER_BUNDLE = function (event) {\n  event.data = event.data || {};\n  event.data.bundle = event.data.bundle || {};\n  if (event.data.bundle.handler) {\n    $tw.bundleHandler[event.data.bundle.handler](event)\n  } else {\n    $tw.bundleHandler['default'](event)\n  }\n  closeIFrame(event.data.origin);\n}\n\n/*\n  The default bundle handler\n*/\n$tw.bundleHandler.default = function(event) {\n  //Check to see if the bundle is empty, if so don't save it\n  if (event.data.bundle.text != '' && event.data.bundle.list != '') {\n    //If the source isn't recognized than set the tiddler as plain text and marke it as having an unrecognized source.\n    event.data.bundle.type = 'text/plain';\n    event.data.bundle.source = 'unrecognized';\n    event.data.bundle.title = event.data.bundle.title + ' - ' + event.data.origin;\n    $tw.wiki.addTiddler(new $tw.Tiddler(event.data.bundle));\n    //We need to create the history tiddler even if we don't have a recognized source.\n    let historyTiddler = $tw.wiki.getTiddler('$:/FetchHistory/' + event.data.origin);\n    let newText = {};\n    if (historyTiddler) {\n      newText = JSON.parse(historyTiddler.fields.text);\n      newText[event.data.filter] = event.data.bundle.most_recent ? event.data.bundle.most_recent:'0';\n    } else {\n      newText[event.data.filter] = event.data.bundle.most_recent ? event.data.bundle.most_recent:'0';\n      historyTiddler = {\n        title: '$:/FetchHistory/' + event.data.origin,\n        type: 'application/json',\n        text: ''\n      };\n    }\n    $tw.wiki.addTiddler(new $tw.Tiddler(historyTiddler, {text: JSON.stringify(newText)}));\n  }\n  $tw.wiki.addTiddler(new $tw.Tiddler($tw.wiki.getCreationFields(),{title: '$:/TiddlerBundleData/' + event.data.bundle.title, list: event.data.bundle.list, text: \"Source: {{!!source}}<br>Tiddlers: <$list filter='[list[]]'><$link to=<<currentTiddler>>><$view field='title'/></$link>, </$list>\", tags: '$:/tags/TiddlerBundle', source: event.origin}));\n}\n\n})();\n",
            "type": "application/javascript",
            "module-type": "utils"
        }
    }

What is this?\n\nSome tools that work on top of the FederationCore plugin.\nThe FederationCore is just the minimum needed to set up federation to pull\ntiddlers from other wikis.\nThis plugin is for tools that are built on top of that.\n\n!! New Bundle Options\n\nNone so far\n\n!! New window message handlers\n\nNone so far\n\n!!         "$:/plugins/Federation/FederationExtended/extendedHandlerOptions.js": {
            "title": "$:/plugins/Federation/FederationExtended/extendedHandlerOptions.js",
            "text": "/*\\\ntitle: $:/plugins/Federation/FederationExtended/extendedHandlerOptions.js\ntype: application/javascript\nmodule-type: utils\n\nThese are functions that define how tiddlers are bundled when a tiddler bundle is requested.\n\nThis is made to extend what is available in the FederationCore plugin and that\nplugin is required for this one to function.\n\nYou can use this as a function template:\n\nFor new ones just use $tw.wiki.functionName = function (event) {\n  <<function Content>>\n  event.source.postMessage({verb:\"DELIVER_BUNDLE\", bundle: Bundle, origin: event.data.destination},\"*\");\n}\n\n\\*/\n(function(){\n\n/*jslint node: true, browser: true */\n/*global $tw: false */\n\"use strict\";\n\nexports.name = \"extendedHandlerOptions\";\nexports.platforms = [\"browser\"];\nexports.before = [\"browser-messaging\"];\nexports.synchronous = true;\n\n$tw.wiki.bundleHandler = $tw.wiki.bundleHandler || {};\n$tw.wiki.bundleFunction = $tw.wiki.bundleFunction || {};\n\n/*\n// An example bundle handler\n$tw.wiki.bundleHandler.someHandler = function(event) {\n  // This is a very simple handler as an example, change it to whatever you\n  // want.\n  const creationFields = $tw.wiki.getCreationFields();\n  event.data.bundle.title = event.data.bundle.title + ' - ' + event.data.origin;\n  $tw.wiki.addTiddler(new $tw.Tiddler(creationFields, event.data.bundle));\n};\n*/\n\n/*\n  This handler unpacks the received bundle as soon as it is received using the\n  built-in import mechanism..\n\n  This is a bad idea.\n*/\n$tw.wiki.bundleHandler.autoUnpack = function(event) {\n  function useNativeImport(self, tiddler) {\n    // Use the build-in importer to import each tiddler\n    tiddler = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(tiddler))\n    self.dispatchEvent({type: \"tm-import-tiddlers\", param: JSON.stringify(tiddler)});\n  }\n  // Parse the incoming bundle\n  const self = this\n  const filterOutput = this.filter ? true:false;\n  const unpackList = (filterOutput)? this.wiki.filterTiddlers(this.filter): []\n  const unpackIt = (filterOutput === false || (unpackList.indexOf(tiddlerName) !== -1))\n  const tiddler = $tw.wiki.getTiddler(this.actionBundle);\n  const separator = (typeof tiddler.fields.separator === 'undefined')?'<!-- TIDDLER SEPARATOR --!>':tiddler.fields.separator;\n  if (tiddler) {\n    //Get the raw text for the bundle.\n    const bundleText = tiddler.getFieldString('text');\n    if (tiddler.fields.bundle_type === 'JSON') {\n      const bundleObject = JSON.parse(tiddler.fields.text);\n      for (let tiddlerName in bundleObject) {\n        if (unpackIt) {\n          useNativeImport(self, bundleObject[tiddlerName])\n        }\n      }\n    } else {\n      //Get the raw text for each tiddler.\n      const rawBundleTiddlers = bundleText.split('\\n' + separator + '\\n');\n      //Create a tiddler from each tiddler. Only overwrite existing tiddlers if this.actionOverwrite is true\n      for (let i = 0; i < rawBundleTiddlers.length; i++) {\n        if (rawBundleTiddlers[i].trim() !== '') {\n          const re = new RegExp('\\\\\\\\' + separator, 'g')\n          const tiddlers = this.wiki.deserializeTiddlers('.tid',rawBundleTiddlers[i].replace(re,separator));\n          $tw.utils.each(tiddlers,function(tiddler) {\n            if (unpackIt) {\n              useNativeImport(self, {fields: tiddler})\n            }\n          });\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n};\n\n})();\n",
            "type": "application/javascript",
            "module-type": "utils"
        },
        "$:/plugins/Federation/FederationExtended/federationExtendedWindowMessageHandlers.js": {
            "title": "$:/plugins/Federation/FederationExtended/federationExtendedWindowMessageHandlers.js",
            "text": "/*\\\ntitle: $:/plugins/Federation/FederationExtended/federationExtendedWindowMessageHandlers.js\ntype: application/javascript\nmodule-type: utils\n\nThese are functions that handle messages that are sent using the postMessage\nfunction to communicate across the iframe boundary.\n\nThese are extensions to what is available in the FederationCore plugin and\nthis plugin requires that one to function.\n\nYou can use this as a function template:\n\nFor new ones just use $tw.wiki.functionName = function (event) {\n  <<function Content>>\n  event.source.postMessage({verb:\"DELIVER_BUNDLE\", bundle: Bundle, origin: event.data.destination},\"*\");\n}\n\n\\*/\n(function(){\n\n/*jslint node: true, browser: true */\n/*global $tw: false */\n\"use strict\";\n\nexports.name = \"federationExtendedWindowMessageHandlers\";\nexports.platforms = [\"browser\"];\nexports.before = [\"browser-messaging\"];\nexports.synchronous = true;\n\nfunction closeIFrame(url) {\n  const iframe = document.body.getElementsByTagName('iframe');\n  for (let j = 0; j < iframe.length; j++) {\n    if (iframe[j].src === url) {\n      document.body.removeChild(iframe[j]);\n      $tw.browserMessaging.iframeInfoMap[url] = null;\n    }\n  }\n}\n\n$tw.windowMessageHandlers = $tw.windowMessageHandlers || {};\n\n/*\n$tw.windowMessageHandlers.EXAMPLE_NAME = function (event) {\n  // If this message would open an iframe, generally you want to close it here.\n  //closeIFrame(event.data.origin);\n}\n*/\n})();\n",
